supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.content: Welcome to Invoi! We're here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please find our contact information below:
supportPage.workingHours: Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM IST

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.intro: Welcome to Invoi! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and services.

sections.content: Invoices uploaded for processing are deleted after a day.
We upload the invoices to our servers for processing
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to external parties
We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information

privacyPolicyPage.consentText: By using our website and services, you consent to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service.

sections.title: User Conduct
sections.content: Users must adhere to guidelines and not engage in prohibited activities.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: Our platform's content and trademarks are protected by intellectual property laws.

sections.title: Privacy Policy
sections.content: User data is handled according to our Privacy Policy, available at https://invoi-one.vercel.app/privacy-policy.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to terminate accounts for violations of the Terms of Service.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: We are not liable for any damages or losses incurred while using our services.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction].

privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to Invoi! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and services.

sections.content: We may collect the following personal information such as email, name
We delete the invoices after 24 hours
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to external parties.
We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information.

privacyPolicy.consentText: By using our website and services, you consent to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

cancellationPolicy.policyText: We regret to inform you that our service does not offer cancellations or refunds. Once a subscription is purchased, it is considered final, and fees are non-refundable.
